hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT org.id, org.name, org.creator.name,org.createTime,org.templateUnitCategory.name FROM TemplateUnitStyle org WHERE org.templateUnitCategory.id = :unit_categoryId AND org.site.id = :siteId ORDER BY org.id desc
FROM TemplateUnitStyle org WHERE org.templateUnitCategory.id = :unit_categoryId AND org.site.id = :siteId ORDER BY org.id desc
FROM TemplateUnitStyle org WHERE org.templateUnitCategory.id = :unit_categoryId AND org.site.id = :siteId AND org.content = :content ORDER BY org.id desc
SELECT templateUnitStyle.name FROM TemplateUnitStyle templateUnitStyle WHERE templateUnitStyle.templateUnitCategory.id =:categoryId
FROM TemplateUnitStyle org WHERE org.id = :styleId AND org.templateUnitCategory.id = :unit_categoryId AND org.site.id = :siteId ORDER BY org.id desc
